article.title: Quintas Jr., Assigned to U.S. Army Armor School

tags.tag: U.S. Army Maneuver Center of Excellence

article.text: Col. Leopoldo A. Quintas Jr., USA, has been nominated for the rank of brigadier general and assigned as commandant, U.S. Army Armor School, U.S. Army Maneuver Center of Excellence, Fort Benning, Georgia.
